blocks.name: rpaddcl
blocks.content: Closure law for addition of positive reals. Part of Axiom 7 of [Apostol] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpaddcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), crp))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), crp), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  rpre(c0)
  rpre(c1)
  readdcl(c0, c1)
  syl2anb(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)))
  elrp(c0)
  elrp(c1)
  an4s(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c1)))
  addgt0(c0, c1)
  elrp(co(c0, caddc, c1))
}

blocks.name: rpmulcl
blocks.content: Closure law for multiplication of positive reals. Part of Axiom 7 of [Apostol] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpmulcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), crp))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), crp), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  rpre(c0)
  rpre(c1)
  remulcl(c0, c1)
  syl2anb(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cmul, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)))
  elrp(c0)
  elrp(c1)
  mulgt0(c0, c1)
  elrp(co(c0, cmul, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rpmulcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→(c0[×]c1)∈ ℝ+)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), (c0[×]c1)∈ ℝ+, (c0[×]c1)∈ ℝ, 0[<](c0[×]c1))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ+, (c0[×]c1)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ)
  rpre(c0)
  rpre(c1)
  remulcl(c0, c1)
  syl2anb(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ+, 0[<](c0[×]c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[<]c0), (c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[<]c1))
  elrp(c0)
  elrp(c1)
  mulgt0(c0, c1)
  elrp((c0[×]c1))
}

blocks.name: rpmtmip
blocks.content: "Minus times minus is plus", see also ~ nnmtmip , holds for positive reals, too (formalized to "The product of two negative reals is a positive real"). "The reason for this" in this case is that ` ( -u A x. -u B ) ` ` = ( A x. B ) ` for all complex numbers ` A ` and ` B ` because of ~ mul2neg , ` A ` and ` B ` are complex numbers because of ~ rpcn , and ` ( A x. B ) e. RR+ ` because of ~ rpmulcl . Note that the opposites ` -u A ` and ` -u B ` of the positive reals ` A ` and ` B ` are negative reals. (Contributed by AV, 23-Dec-2022.)

blocks.name: rpdivcl
blocks.content: Closure law for division of positive reals. (Contributed by FL, 27-Dec-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpdivcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), crp))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), crp), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cdiv, c1)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  rpre(c0)
  rprene0(c1)
  3expb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cr))
  redivcl(c0, c1)
  syl2anb(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, crp), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, cdiv, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)))
  elrp(c0)
  elrp(c1)
  divgt0(c0, c1)
  elrp(co(c0, cdiv, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rpdivcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+)→(c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ+)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ+), (c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ+, (c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ, 0[<](c0[÷]c1))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ+, (c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ, (c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))
  rpre(c0)
  rprene0(c1)
  3expb(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c1 ≠ 0, (c0[÷]c1)∈ ℝ)
  redivcl(c0, c1)
  syl2anb(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ+, 0[<](c0[÷]c1), (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[<]c0), (c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[<]c1))
  elrp(c0)
  elrp(c1)
  divgt0(c0, c1)
  elrp((c0[÷]c1))
}

blocks.name: rpgecl
blocks.content: A number greater than or equal to a positive real is positive real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpgecl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c1, crp))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  ltletrd(nat0, c1, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  0red(w3a(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cr))
  rpre(c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  rpgt0(c0)
  simp3(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  elrp(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rpgecl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[≤]c1)→ c1 ∈ ℝ+)
} = {
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[≤]c1), c1 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ, 0[<]c1)
  ltletrd(nat0, c1, c0, (c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[≤]c1))
  0red((c0 ∈ ℝ+ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c0[≤]c1))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ, c0[≤]c1, c0 ∈ ℝ)
  rpre(c0)
  simp2(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ, c0[≤]c1)
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ, c0[≤]c1, 0[<]c0)
  rpgt0(c0)
  simp3(c0 ∈ ℝ+, c1 ∈ ℝ, c0[≤]c1)
  elrp(c1)
}

blocks.name: ge0p1rp
blocks.content: A nonnegative number plus one is a positive number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ge0p1rp(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), crp))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), crp), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  lelttrd(nat0, co(c0, caddc, nat1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
  0red(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr))
  peano2re(c0)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  ltp1(c0)
  elrp(co(c0, caddc, nat1))
}

blocks.name: rpneg
blocks.content: Either a nonzero real or its negation is a positive real, but not both. Axiom 8 of [Apostol] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm rpneg(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wb(wcel(c0, crp), wn(wcel(cneg(c0), crp))))
} = {
  3bitr4g(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wcel(c0, crp), wn(wcel(cneg(c0), crp)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wn(wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wn(wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))), wo(wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wo(wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))), wo(wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
  impbid2(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wo(wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)))
  olcd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)), wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cr), wi(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ltle(nat0, c0)
  jctild(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wo(wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  jaod(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0), wi(wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  pm2.24d(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  renegcl(c0)
  imp(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0), wi(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))
  expcomd(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  biimprd(wcel(c0, cr), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wne(c0, nat0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c0))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wne(c0, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  ltlen(nat0, c0)
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0))
  orbi2d(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0)), wn(wcel(cneg(c0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cr), wne(c0, nat0), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))))
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))), wn(wbr(c0, clt, nat0)))
  mpan(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, nat0))), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  lenlt(nat0, c0)
  notbid(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))
  lt0neg1(c0)
  ianor(wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))
  elrp(c0)
  notbii(wcel(cneg(c0), crp), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))))
  elrp(cneg(c0))
}

blocks.name: lediv2ad
blocks.content: Division of both sides of 'less than or equal to' into a nonnegative number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm lediv2ad(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, co(c0, cdiv, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c2, cle, c1))
} = {
  syl31anc(w0, wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, co(c0, cdiv, c2)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0)), wbr(c2, cle, c1))
  rpregt0d(c2, w0)
  rpregt0d(c1, w0)

  ltmul1d(c1, nat0, c0, wa(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, c0)))

blocks.name: prodge0rd
blocks.content: Infer that a multiplicand is nonnegative from a positive multiplier and nonnegative product. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm prodge0rd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, crp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, co(c1, cmul, c0)))
} = {
  nltled(nat0, c0, w0)
  mtod(w0, wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(co(c1, cmul, c0), clt, nat0))
  lensymd(co(c1, cmul, c0), nat0, w0)
  0red(w0)
  3imtr4d(w0, wbr(c0, clt, nat0), wbr(co(c1, cmul, c0), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c0))))
  ex(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c0))))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, cneg(co(c1, cmul, c0)), co(c1, cmul, cneg(c0)), wa(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))))
  mulgt0d(c1, cneg(c0), wa(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  adantr(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
  renegcld(c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wbr(nat0, clt, c1))
  rpgt0d(c1, w0)
  simpr(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)))
  mulneg2d(c1, c0, wa(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  recnd(c1, w0)
  adantr(w0, wbr(nat0, clt, cneg(c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  recnd(c0, w0)
  lt0neg1d(c0, w0)
  lt0neg1d(co(c1, cmul, c0), w0)
  remulcld(c1, c0, w0)
  rpred(c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm prodge0rd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 0[≤]c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ+)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → 0[≤](c1[×]c0))
} = {
  nltled(nat0, c0, w0)
  mtod(w0, c0[<]0, (c1[×]c0)[<]0)
  lensymd((c1[×]c0), nat0, w0)
  0red(w0)
  3imtr4d(w0, c0[<]0, (c1[×]c0)[<]0, 0[<]-u(c0), 0[<]-u((c1[×]c0)))
  ex(w0, 0[<]-u(c0), 0[<]-u((c1[×]c0)))
  breqtrd(nat0, clt, -u((c1[×]c0)), (c1[×]-u(c0)), (w0 ∧ 0[<]-u(c0)))
  mulgt0d(c1, -u(c0), (w0 ∧ 0[<]-u(c0)))
  adantr(w0, 0[<]-u(c0), c1 ∈ ℝ)
  adantr(w0, 0[<]-u(c0), -u(c0)∈ ℝ)
  renegcld(c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, 0[<]-u(c0), 0[<]c1)
  rpgt0d(c1, w0)
  simpr(w0, 0[<]-u(c0))
  mulneg2d(c1, c0, (w0 ∧ 0[<]-u(c0)))
  adantr(w0, 0[<]-u(c0), c1 ∈ ℂ)
  recnd(c1, w0)
  adantr(w0, 0[<]-u(c0), c0 ∈ ℂ)
  recnd(c0, w0)
  lt0neg1d(c0, w0)
  lt0neg1d((c1[×]c0), w0)
  remulcld(c1, c0, w0)
  rpred(c1, w0)
}

  pm3.2i(wcel(nat1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  1re()
  0lt1()

  nngt0(c0)
  lediv2(nat1, c1, c0)
  breq2d(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, co(c0, cdiv, nat1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, crp)))

  nnrp(c1)

  ex(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cn), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, c0))
  mpbird(wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cn)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c1), cle, c0), wbr(co(nat0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat0))
  syl6eqbr(co(nat0, cdiv, c1), cle, nat0, nat0, wa(wceq(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cn)))

blocks.name: addlelt
blocks.content: If the sum of a real number and a positive real number is less than or equal to a third real number, the first real number is less than the third real number. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm addlelt(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp)), wi(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
} = {
  mpand(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)))
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp)), wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))
  rpgt0(c2)
  ltaddposd(c2, c0, w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp), wcel(c2, cr))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, clt, co(c0, caddc, c2)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, c1)), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp), wcel(co(c0, caddc, c2), cr))
  readdcld(c0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, crp)))
  simpl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, crp))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, crp), wcel(c2, cr))
  rpre(c2)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, crp))
  ltletr(c0, co(c0, caddc, c2), c1)
}

thm addlelt(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+)→((c0[+]c2)[≤]c1 → c0[<]c1))
} = {
  mpand((c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+), (c0[+]c2)[≤]c1, c0[<]c1, c0[<](c0[+]c2))

  rpgt0(c2)
  ltaddposd(c2, c0, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c1 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+))

  simp1(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  3adant2(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ+, (c0[+]c2)∈ ℝ)
  readdcld(c0, c2, (c0 ∈ ℝ ∧ c2 ∈ ℝ+))
  simpl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ+, c2 ∈ ℝ)
  rpre(c2)
  simp2(c0 ∈ ℝ, c1 ∈ ℝ, c2 ∈ ℝ+)
  ltletr(c0, (c0[+]c2), c1)
}
